PassiveDesc.Name: Pony Express
PassiveDesc.Desc: At the end of the Scene, if all allies are alive, gain 1 Haste and 1 Cycle next Scene; if all other allies are dead, inflict 2 Bind on self instead. This passive ability is only active if the Act started with one or more other allies.

PassiveDesc.Name: Special Delivery!
PassiveDesc.Desc: While the character has Cycle, Blunt and Defensive dice gain +1 Power.

PassiveDesc.Name: Same-Day Delivery
PassiveDesc.Desc: If 3 or fewer pages are in-hand at the end of the Scene, gain 1 Haste and Cycle next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Posthaste
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain an additional Speed Die at Emotion Level 2. (Cannot Overlap)

PassiveDesc.Name: Posthaste
PassiveDesc.Desc: Gain an additional Speed Die at Emotion Level 2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Arctic Drift
PassiveDesc.Desc: Offensive dice on the first Combat Page the character uses each Scene gain an additional effect: ‘[On Hit] Inflict 1 Bind to each other next Scene’

PassiveDesc.Name: Steady
PassiveDesc.Desc: Take 2 less damage and Stagger damage from enemies with higher Speed.

PassiveDesc.Name: Vengeance Call
PassiveDesc.Desc: If an ally dies, restore 1 Light and gain a Speed die next Scene.

PassiveDesc.Name: Do I Wanna Know?
PassiveDesc.Desc: Choose the Speed dice with the lowest value; the Speed values of the dice become 2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Heightened Emotions II
PassiveDesc.Desc: Start the reception at Emotion Level 2.

PassiveDesc.Name: Inferno Templar
PassiveDesc.Desc: Melee Pierce Dice gain +1 Power and deal +2 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Inferno Corps
PassiveDesc.Desc: Pierce Dice Power +1; Ranged Pierce dice deal +1 damage.

PassiveDesc.Name: Experimental Plate B1
PassiveDesc.Desc: When hit, while this character has Overheat, inflict 1 Burn to the attacker

PassiveDesc.Name: Experimental Plate D4
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character has Overheat, gain two Counter dice (Block, 3-6) at combat start.

PassiveDesc.Name: Temperamental Weapon
PassiveDesc.Desc: While this character has Overheat, inflict 1 Burn upon a successful attack
